nodes.text: Breasts were an anatomical feature on some species in the galaxy, such as the human, Dowaaka, and Askajian species.

Humans were a species in the galaxy known to experience breast development during adolescence. The adolescent human female Jyn Erso preferred to show off the development of her bicep muscles; however, she was pleased to dress up in a fitted robe and cosmetics when she participated in the infiltration of Inusagi's sakoola blossom festival by Saw Gerrera's Partisans. Male human Jedi Knight Rael Averross found the large breasts of Selbie sexually attractive.

Some adult beings displayed increased development of the chest muscles beneath their breasts, including the male Jedi Master Kirak Infil'a, Nautolan male Jedi Master Kit Fisto, and human males such as Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, former Jedi Taron Malicos, and Kylo Ren. The female Inquisitor known as the Ninth Sister, a member of the Dowutin species that was known for its physical strength, wore fitted armor that exhibited her large muscles.
Members of the reptilian Dowaaka species had four large breasts. The Askajian female Yarna d'al' Gargan, who was an enslaved dancer at Jabba the Hutt's palace, had six.
Prairie-fowl breasts were a food eaten on Lothal. Merei Spanjaf brought them home with tubers for her mother, Jessa Spanjaf, to cook.
Since breasts reasonably appear in every piece of Star Wars media, this list only includes specific mentions of them in dialogue or identifications in text.
